version_description:
* Enhanced for WatchOS 3.0. Removed support for old WatchOS 1.0.
* Enhanced for iPhone 6S and iPhone 7.
* Bugfixes and optimizations

* Enhanced for WatchOS 3.0. Removed support for old WatchOS 1.0.
* Enhanced for iPhone 6S and iPhone 7.
* Bugfixes and optimizations

* New iCloud sync engine via CloudKit technology
(Use app settings to adjust iCloud sync)
* Bugfixes and optimisations

* New iCloud sync engine via CloudKit technology
(Use app settings to adjust iCloud sync)
* Bugfixes and optimisations

* Optimised iCloud sync for custom photos
(Adjust iCloud sync in app settings)
* Bugfixes and optimisations
* iCloud-sync your data across your family members! - Just tap "Manage sharing group" in app settings and invite your participants (requires iOS 10).

* Added app widget - now you can make shopping even without unlocking your iPhone! (requires iOS 10)
* Further enhanced group sharing, enhanced watch support, enhanced larger devices support

* Now the app has more upgrade options
* Enhanced app widget support
* Enhanced Apple Watch support

* Added Shopping templates:
- After you have created your shopping list - you can save it as template
- Choose a template while starting a new shopping!
* Chosen products now move up in the list (you can adjust that in the app settings)
* iPad Pro 10.5" and 12.9" resolution support
* iPad multitasking support - use shopping list side-by-side to other apps

Upgrading the app also upgrades your data in iCloud - so please upgrade the app on all your devices that are in sync.

* Compatibility to upcoming iOS versions and devices
* Bugfixes
* iPhone X screen support, iOS 11 compatibility
